beer.beer_description: Innis & Gunn was born from the discovery that the marriage of oak and beer can create something pretty remarkable and the brewer’s new Fired Oak Scotch Ale proves this case in point. The key to imparting outstanding flavour is all about finding the perfect match and balance of ingredients. This Scotch Ale uses a combination of lightly toasted oak and a unique batch of charred Heartwood American oak, flamed and blackened to give an intense roasted flavour. Notes of coffee, spices, vanilla and caramel give a balanced sweetness and transform this beer into a new cult classic.

items.checkin_comment: Carbonation makes it feel light. Flavour like no other. Unsweetened caramel if it ever exists. Perfection.
